item.title: B2VB challenge, making my Best Bar Chart
item.description: For so long I wanted to have an excuse for use Tableau, Iâ€™m a Power BI user (just for work), so this Back 2 Viz Basics challenge (#B2VB on Twitter) created by Eric Balash is that perfect excuse.
